title.rendered: Michel Gondry’s ‘The Book Of Solutions’ Acquired In English-Language Territories By AI Firm Flawless

excerpt.rendered: Distributor-financier XYZ Films and producer Tea Shop Productions have worked with us to acquire Michel Gondry’s 2023 Cannes Directors’ Fortnight movie The Book Of Solutions for all English-speaking territories.
